name: Google MCP Server
description: Let Claude access Gmail and Google Calendar with write permissions
long_description:
This extension allows Claude to interact with your Gmail and Google Calendar, enabling it to send emails, create drafts, and manage calendar events. Perfect for automating email workflows and scheduling tasks.

Features:
- Send emails with HTML formatting
- Create email drafts
- Create, update, and delete calendar events
- Invite attendees to meetings

Authentication uses OAuth Device Code Flow - no manual configuration needed! Simply authorize when prompted.

tools.name: create_draft
tools.description: Create an email draft in Gmail

tools.name: create_calendar_event
tools.description: Create a new Google Calendar event

tools.name: update_calendar_event
tools.description: Update an existing Google Calendar event
